title: Testing New Edges

panel_structure.description: Wide shot of bureaucratic checkpoint with reality officers looking confused as Evan and Architect's forms flicker between states
Medium shot of them filling out forms that keep changing, laughing at the impossibility
panel_structure.focus: Joy in not fitting prescribed boxes

panel_structure.description: Close on their intertwined data/flesh as they walk past the checkpoint, leaving glitching forms behind

transformation_notes: The checkpoint becomes a place of liberation rather than constraint. Their post-dissolution connection breaks all standard forms.
dialogue_rhythm: Playful, finishing each other's jokes, conspiratorial
